title: Start your journey with Jasper AI

content: In fact, many people are now worried that by using AI, people can lose their tone of voice. Don't you agree?

Sometimes, the content generated by AI can sound just a little weird or generic.

It may be too obvious that a text was AI-generated, for example.

You don't want to face this problem, but you want to optimize your work using AI?

Then this guide is for you! This is exactly what Jasper AI does in contrast to other AI tools.

With Jasper AI, you can upload knowledge about your business, your products, your audiences, and the AI can then write factually about your business in your brand voice.

I will teach you how. Let's first get introduced to its interface.
The Jasper AI interface is user-friendly and designed to help you create content effortlessly. Let's take a quick tour of the main features you'll be using.
The Home is your starting point. Here, you can start creating right away by specifying a writing task.

You can also find a link to JasperCommunity on this page. This is where you can connect with other freelancers, entrepreneurs, and marketers.

It is updated daily with best practices, tips, and even product roadmap rollouts to keep you informed and educated.
Moreover, there is a button to install the Jasper Chrome Extension and use it everywhere you write online.

Now, we can move on to other pages that you can find on the left of the website. The next one is My Content.

Here, you can see an overview of your projects and recent documents. It's designed to help you stay organized and jump right into your work.

Then, there are pages Campaigns and Art for your art. Inside each one, Jasper AI offers a variety of templates to help you get started with different types of content.

Whether you're writing blog posts, social media updates, or email newsletters, there's a template to suit your needs. These templates are designed to guide you and ensure that your content is structured and effective.
After that, there is a chat where the magic happens. Here, you can write, edit, and format your content through prompts!
Great job! You've taken your first steps with Jasper AI and learned how to navigate its interface.
In the next lesson, we'll dive into generating your first AI content with Jasper - starting with a product description.
